allow: Bash(npx shadcn@latest add button card input label select tabs badge table dialog separator scroll-area progress tooltip checkbox sheet accordion textarea dropdown-menu -y)
Bash(npx shadcn@latest add button card input label select tabs badge table dialog separator scroll-area progress tooltip checkbox sheet accordion textarea dropdown-menu)

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -File - <<'PSEOF'
$csv = Import-Csv "C:\\Users\\adven\\Documents\\AlexCoding\\pf1e\\src\\data\\equipment\\magic_items_full - Updated 19Jan2020.csv"
$csv | Select-Object -First 5 Name,Slot,PriceValue,WeightValue,Group | Format-Table -AutoSize
PSEOF)

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -File - <<'PSEOF'
$csv = Import-Csv "C:\\Users\\adven\\Documents\\AlexCoding\\pf1e\\src\\data\\equipment\\magic_items_full - Updated 19Jan2020.csv"
$csv | Where-Object { $_.PriceValue -eq '' -or $_.PriceValue -eq '0' } | Select-Object -First 10 Name,Price,PriceValue,Group | Format-Table -AutoSize
PSEOF)

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -File - <<'PSEOF'
$csv = Import-Csv "C:\\Users\\adven\\Documents\\AlexCoding\\pf1e\\src\\data\\equipment\\magic_items_full - Updated 19Jan2020.csv"
$csv | Group-Object -Property Slot | Sort-Object Count -Descending | Select-Object Count, Name | Format-Table -AutoSize
PSEOF)
